fluid.description: The namespace and ID of the fluid tag that should be checked. Most important examples: `minecraft:water` and `minecraft:lava`.
fluid.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the fluid tag that should be checked. Most important examples: `minecraft:water` and `minecraft:lava`.

type.description:
## Submerged In

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/submerged_in)

Checks whether the entity's eyes are in a fluid that is included in the specified fluid tag.

Type ID: `origins:submerged_in`




---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:submerged_in",
    "fluid": "minecraft:water"
}
```

This example will check if the player is submerged in water.
